name: Nike Men's Running Shoes
description: Get ready for your next run with these comfortable and stylish Nike running shoes. Designed for maximum performance and durability.

name: Adidas Women's Yoga Pants
description: Enhance your yoga practice with these Adidas yoga pants. Made from breathable and stretchable fabric for ultimate comfort during your workouts.

name: Under Armour Men's Compression Shirt
description: Train harder and longer with this Under Armour compression shirt. It provides a snug fit to support your muscles and improve blood circulation.

name: Reebok Women's CrossFit Gloves
description: Protect your hands during intense CrossFit workouts with these Reebok gloves. They offer excellent grip and palm protection for lifting and gripping.

name: Puma Men's Soccer Cleats
description: Dominate the field with these high-performance Puma soccer cleats. Designed for speed, agility, and precision ball control on any surface.

name: Nike Women's Tennis Skirt
description: Stay stylish and comfortable on the tennis court with this Nike tennis skirt. It features moisture-wicking fabric and built-in shorts for added support.

name: Adidas Men's Basketball Shorts
description: Elevate your game in these Adidas basketball shorts. Made from lightweight and breathable fabric for unrestricted movement on the court.

name: Under Armour Women's Sports Bra
description: Stay supported and comfortable during your workouts with this Under Armour sports bra. It offers a secure fit and moisture-wicking properties.
